Articles.Content: I\'m getting sick and tired from delete ksp becouse of the addons stufing my game,is anything i can do to not have problems when add new addon thank you

First and foremost, always read *everything* about any addons you download. Second, always check in case two or more addons you want to use won\'t work together (I don\'t know of any myself, but there is often a few with games like this).

And finally, just remember to always be patient and tell the creators of the addons of any problems you may have, preferably by posting in the addon\'s thread, so that they can fix the issue ASAP, assuming you have not made any errors when installing it.

The JS Generic Mod Enabler helps alot when you want to add or remove an addon (parts, plugins,...). There is no need to remove the whole ksp folder.

Try this: [http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=997.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=997.0)

Thanx for the hint but sometimes i add some addons at the time now i doing 1 at the time so i know when i got stuffed,the JS Generic Mod Enabler i saw that but is very old and don\'t have a update is the version in the forum still ok in the ksp 0.15?

 Thank you
